text:
- Replaced Navigator with GoRouter for navigation in ExerciseScreen, LanguageSelect, ResultScreen, TutorialScreen, and WelcomeScreen. 
- Updated ExerciseScreen to improve audio playback state management and UI updates.
- Refactored LanguageSelect to use the new language view model.
- Introduced OnboardingRepository and its local implementation for onboarding state management.
- Created AppUiState and AppViewModel to manage application-wide UI state.
- Added routing logic for onboarding and tutorial navigation.
- Removed deprecated dependencies and updated pubspec.yaml for new packages.
